annotate_step.explanation_1: In this step you need to indicate different examples of objects for each object class you want to detect.
annotate_step.explanation_2: For that, you can draw rectangles on the objects of interest in each image tile. When you reach the end you can advance to the next page. When finished, click on
annotate_step.title: Annotate images

create_step.classes_helper_1: Enter the name of a class and press the
create_step.classes_helper_2: key. You can enter several classes in this way.
create_step.error_msg_classes: Please add at least one object class.
create_step.error_msg_duplicate: Model already exists, please enter another name.
create_step.error_msg_internal: An error has ocurred. Please retry.
create_step.name_helper: Enter a name for your model.
create_step.title: Create new model

new.explanation: Choose the type of model you want to create.

success_msg: Your message has been sent. Thank you!

train_step.explanation: Your model is currently being trained. This process may take a few hours. We will notify you by mail when it is ready to be used.
train_step.title: Train model

upload_step.dropzone: Drag and drop your images here, or click.
upload_step.title: Upload images
